thread.title: Go Ara Talks About Dating, Writer Kim Eun Sook, And More In Recent Interview
thread.title_full: Go Ara Talks About Dating, Writer Kim Eun Sook, And More In Recent Interview

author: choralee
title: Go Ara Talks About Dating, Writer Kim Eun Sook, And More In Recent Interview
text:
Pin   
Go Ara recently sat down for an interview, where she talked honestly about dating, writer Kim Eun Sook, and her current drama “ Hwarang .” 
The actress held the interview on February 21, and talked about her current drama “Hwarang,” which is ending soon. “We finished filming in the summer, but it felt like finishing the drama after one year. Because it was 100 percent pre-produced, I made sure to watch it,” she said. 
Go Ara also talked about turning 28 this year and shared her thoughts on dating and marriage, saying, “I really want to date. It might come and go but I do want to date. Now is the time for me to date. A lot of my friends are married. There must be fate. I’m waiting.” 
She also talked about writer Kim Eun Sook, saying, “I really love writer Kim Eun Sook. There isn’t really anything left for me to say but I really enjoyed watching her most recent drama and I’ve been living vicariously through it.” 
Meanwhile, Go Ara stars in “Hwarang” as Aro. The final episode for the drama is set to air on February 21.
